translations.text: By the night when it covers,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the day when it shines!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And by ˹the One˺ Who created male and female!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Surely the ends you strive for are diverse.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: As for the one who is charitable, mindful ˹of Allah˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and ˹firmly˺ believes in the finest reward,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: We will facilitate for them the Way of Ease.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translation.text: and considers himself free from need

translations.text: And as for the one who is stingy, indifferent ˹to Allah˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: We will facilitate for them the path of hardship.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

translations.text: And their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they tumble ˹into Hell˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: It is certainly upon Us ˹alone˺ to show ˹the way to˺ guidance.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And surely to Us ˹alone˺ belong this life and the next.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And so I have warned you of a raging Fire,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: in which none will burn except the most wretched—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translation.text: But will be removed from it

translations.text: But the righteous will be spared from it—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: who donate ˹some of˺ their wealth only to purify themselves,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰٓ

translations.text: not in return for someone’s favours,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: but seeking the pleasure of their Lord, the Most High.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
